Class AbstractTradingStrategy

java.lang.Object
  net.sourceforge.jabm.strategy.AbstractStrategy
      net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.AbstractTradingStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, net.sourceforge.jabm.event.EventListener, net.sourceforge.jabm.strategy.Strategy, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Prototypeable, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Resetable, TradingStrategy, MarketEventListener
Direct Known Subclasses:
FixedQuantityStrategyImpl
public abstract class AbstractTradingStrategy
extends net.sourceforge.jabm.strategy.AbstractStrategy
implements java.io.Serializable, TradingStrategy, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Resetable, java.lang.Cloneable

An abstract implementation of the Strategy interface that provides skeleton functionality for making trading decisions.
